tool_description: Calculates average lead times and variability metrics for products from different suppliers based on historical delivery performance.

supplier_ids.description: Supplier identifiers to analyze lead times for

product_categories.description: Product categories to include in analysis

error_messages: Insufficient delivery data: Supplier must have at least 5 completed deliveries for reliable lead time calculation.
Invalid supplier ID: One or more supplier IDs not found in system.
No matching product categories: Specified categories have no delivery history with given suppliers.
usage: Provide supplier IDs and product categories to calculate lead time statistics. Results include average lead times and variability measures for safety stock calculations.

average_lead_times.description: Average lead times in days for each supplier-category combination

lead_time_variability.description: Standard deviation of lead times for each combination

reliability_scores.description: Delivery reliability scores from 0-100 for each supplier
